website_summaries.verdict: Between the breakaway truck, multiple figures, and towering T-Rex, this comprehensive LEGO playset features everything a Jurassic World fan would want.
pros: Build medical station and transport truck to haul the tyrannosaurus
Includes T-Rex, Baby Dino, and 3 human minifigures
Combine parts with other dinos to make hybrid monsters

customer_reviews.title: Great Lego
customer_reviews.text: My 5-year old grandson is very good at following the Lego directions and built this set completely by himself in just a few hours. He enjoyed putting it together, but when he was finished, he had just as much fun playing with it. The set consists of a medical monitoring unit, a truck, a dinosaur transport trailer, a large dinosaur, a baby dinosaur and 3 figures and was very conducive to imaginary play.
customer_reviews.author: jb

customer_reviews.title: OUtanding toy from an outstanding company.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent craftsmanship, very detailed. The finished product is beautiful and sturdy. My grandson loooves it. I was missing a critical part to close the sides of the truck and the book 2/3 . I contacted LEGO customer service and the representatives were very helpful. I received the part on a timely manner and I completed the truck successfully.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen B

customer_reviews.title: Jurassic World and Legos an awsome match!!!
customer_reviews.text: Jurassic World and Legos a perfect match!!! Lego please make more, my son has so much fun with these and I think they are cool too. Truck is on the small size compared to the movie, but then again do we want a more expensive toy. So a decent balance.
customer_reviews.author: Styx_Ray

customer_reviews.title: Never go wrong with legos
customer_reviews.text: Grandson (6 yrs ) and I have wonderful hours of building all the lego sets. Especially since we are both dinosaur enthusiasts . Very detailed and takes time and patience. But he plays with it every time he comes to visit - weekly! We LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.author: PL

customer_reviews.title: I made an error. It is expensive though. But they are legos
customer_reviews.text: I had reviewed product as a 3 because I found cheaper. My mistake. It was the wrong one. I did purchase it at kohl’s for $28.00. 75928. And yes it was cheaper than Michael’s. This one was not at Michael’s.75933. That are all good but I imagine some are small as mentioned. I don’t know that.
customer_reviews.author: dolphingirl

customer_reviews.title: Amazing idea!
customer_reviews.text: The best toy! Love this cage car! I wish Lego did more cars like this! Super interactive toy!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful gift
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my friend as his birthday gift and he really enjoyed it. LEGO always offers the best quality of their products and it’s really fun to assemble any of them. It is also fun to just watch the other peoples assembling it. Great design and remake from the Jurassic world movie series. High recommended
customer_reviews.author: Jing L

customer_reviews.title: lego jurassic world
customer_reviews.text: this product was a whole mess a rip off please send me a refund asap only reason i didn't send this back was because it was christmas and for my grandson the pieces were so small he's 6 years old and couldn't put that mess together such a shame amazon should be ashamed of themselves for selling that mess .
customer_reviews.author: yoli01

customer_reviews.title: Lego Dinos...Enough Said
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent Lego set to get for...anyone, really. I bought it for myself and the kiddos love it as well. There's plenty of detail and an interesting build, but playing with the dinosaurs and trucking them around is the fun part! But, for me, it's also a great display piece that sparks conversations about movies, dinos, etc.
customer_reviews.author: MRN Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Amazing set
customer_reviews.text: This set uses a lot of good techniques and the figures have awesome detail. Plus you can’t go wrong with a giant LEGO T-Rex!

customer_reviews.title: LEGOs for ever!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson was so excited to receive this for Christmas. He is entertained for hours...his imagination is beyond description.. LEGO’s are expensive, but are worth every dime! LEGO’s build imagination on every level!

customer_reviews.title: One of the pieces didn't fit.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product as with all Lego, got it for my nephew for Christmas. There's just one flaw, the piece that connects the trailer to the truck doesn't fit. The package came with the wrong one. It should be a circle connector but instead it came with a cross one and in kind of ruins the fun.

customer_reviews.title: The tractor/trailer is well made and a lot of fun to play with (for both my eight year old ...
customer_reviews.text: T Rex Transport 75933 is an exceptional Lego set. The tractor/trailer is well made and a lot of fun to play with (for both my eight year old grandson and myself, a 62 year old grandfather). I like the scale also. The tractor is an unusual eight Lego studs wide which is perfect for my 1/39 scale (1 Lego stud = 1 ft) custom Lego train set. I wish Lego would make a lot more models in this scale.
customer_reviews.author: Wystar

product_meta.title: LEGO Jurassic World T. rex Transport 75933 Dinosaur Play Set with Toy Truck (609 Pieces)
product_meta.description: Size:609Kids can help save the T. Rex with this action toy inspired by Jurassic World. They’ll have to think fast and perform a dinosaur blood transfusion with the mobile laboratory unit before returning the dinosaur toy to the transporter, featuring a single-seater blue truck and detachable container with opening and lockable side panels. This dinosaur set includes a Jurassic World Zia minifigure, 2 guard minifigures and 2 dinosaur figures.
feature_bullets: Kids can save the escaped T. rex toy and perform a dinosaur blood transfusion with the help of Jurassic World's Zia. They'll have to get past the 2 guard minifigures and save the baby dinosaur figure to return the T. rex to the toy truck.

This dinosaur set features a single-seater blue truck and a detachable toy trailer with a containment unit for the toy dinosaur that has opening and lockable side panels. The guard minifigures also come with toy weapons.
After the dinosaur action figure escapes, your kids can use the landing gear, mobile medical unit and monitoring system with 2 transfusion leads to play out action scenes and save the T. rex
This dinosaur model kit brings to life a dinosaur adventure for kids with Jurassic World action figures suitable for ages 7-12

Toy truck measures over 3” (8cm) high, 5” (14cm) long and 3” (8cm) wide, toy trailer with containment unit measures over 6” (16cm) high, 6” (17cm) long and 3” (9cm) wide, T. rex toy stands over 6” (17cm) high with posable limbs, head & snapping jaws

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars550 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
